title: Prey
description: The Other Side Has Broken ThroughFollowing the mysterious death of his parents, Detective Eric Archer goes home to the idyllic Western New York town of Chadwick Bay. There, he joins old colleagues and makes new acquaintances in Jessica Benitez, Eliseo Gomez, and the enigmatic Dr. William Dirk.They uncover decades-old family secrets that shakes the foundation of their reality.Alliances are formed, friends become foes.An ancient entityâ€™s plan to enslave the people of Earth is about to be unleashed. With the fate of humanity at risk, Eric Archer and his friends must race to unravel the mystery of how to defeat aGod-king.
author: Tim Majka
